verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to thee that spoilest <WH7703> <WH8802>, and thou wast not spoiled <WH7703> <WH8803>; and dealest treacherously <WH898> <WH8802>, and they dealt not treacherously <WH898> <WH8804> with thee! when thou shalt cease <WH8552> <WH8687> to spoil <WH7703> <WH8802>, thou shalt be spoiled <WH7703> <WH8714>; and when thou shalt make an end <WH5239> <WH8687> to deal treacherously <WH898> <WH8800>, they shall deal treacherously <WH898> <WH8799> with thee.

O YY <WH3068>, be gracious <WH2603> <WH8798> unto us; we have waited <WH6960> <WH8765> for thee: be thou their arm <WH2220> every morning <WH1242>, our salvation <WH3444> also in the time <WH6256> of trouble <WH6869>.
At the noise <WH6963> of the tumult <WH1995> the people <WH5971> fled <WH5074> <WH8804>; at the lifting up <WH7427> of thyself the nations <WH1471> were scattered <WH5310> <WH8804>.

And your spoil <WH7998> shall be gathered <WH622> <WH8795> like the gathering <WH625> of the caterpiller <WH2625>: as the running to and fro <WH4944> of locusts <WH1357> shall he run <WH8264> <WH8802> upon them.
The YY <WH3068> is exalted <WH7682> <WH8737>; for he dwelleth <WH7931> <WH8802> on high <WH4791>: he hath filled <WH4390> <WH8765> TZiyon <WH6726> with judgment <WH4941> and righteousness <WH6666>.

And wisdom <WH2451> and knowledge <WH1847> shall be the stability <WH530> of thy times <WH6256>, and strength <WH2633> of salvation <WH3444>: the fear <WH3374> of the YY <WH3068> is his treasure <WH214>.
Behold, their valiant ones <WH691> shall cry <WH6817> <WH8804> without <WH2351>: the ambassadors <WH4397> of peace <WH7965> shall weep <WH1058> <WH8799> bitterly <WH4751>.

The highways <WH4546> lie waste <WH8074> <WH8738>, the wayfaring man <WH5674> <WH8802> <WH734> ceaseht <WH7673> <WH8804>: he hath broken <WH6565> <WH8689> the covenant <WH1285>, he hath despised <WH3988> <WH8804> the cities <WH5892>, he regardeth <WH2803> <WH8804> no man <WH582>.

The earth <WH776> mourneth <WH56> <WH8804> and languisheth <WH535> <WH8797>: Lebanon <WH3844> is ashamed <WH2659> <WH8689> and hewn down <WH7060> <WH8804>: Sharon <WH8289> is like a wilderness <WH6160>; and Bashan <WH1316> and Karmel <WH3760> shake off <WH5287> <WH8802> their fruits.
Now will I rise <WH6965> <WH8799>, saith <WH559> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>; now will I be exalted <WH7426> <WH8735>; now will I lift up <WH5375> <WH8735> myself.
Ye shall conceive <WH2029> <WH8799> chaff <WH2842>, ye shall bring forth <WH3205> <WH8799> stubble <WH7179>: your breath <WH7307>, as fire <WH784>, shall devour <WH398> <WH8799> you.
And the people <WH5971> shall be as the burnings <WH4955> of lime <WH7875>: as tshofars <WH6975> cut up <WH3683> <WH8803> shall they be burned <WH3341> <WH8799> in the fire <WH784>.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, ye that are far off <WH7350>, what I have done <WH6213> <WH8804>; and, ye that are near <WH7138>, acknowledge <WH3045> <WH8798> my might <WH1369>.

The sinners <WH2400> in TZiyon <WH6726> are afraid <WH6342> <WH8804>; fearfulness <WH7461> hath surprised <WH270> <WH8804> the hypocrites <WH2611>. Who among us shall dwell <WH1481> <WH8799> with the devouring <WH398> <WH8802> fire <WH784>? who among us shall dwell <WH1481> <WH8799> with everlasting <WH5769> burnings <WH4168> ?

He that walketh <WH1980> <WH8802> righteously <WH6666>, and speaketh <WH1696> <WH8802> uprightly <WH4339>; he that despiseht <WH3988> <WH8802> the gain <WH1215> of oppressions <WH4642>, that shaketh <WH5287> <WH8802> his hands <WH3709> from holding <WH8551> <WH8800> of bribes <WH7810>, that stoppeth <WH331> <WH8801> his ears <WH241> from hearing <WH8085> <WH8800> of blood <WH1818>, and shutteth <WH6105> <WH8802> his eyes <WH5869> from seeing <WH7200> <WH8800> evil <WH7451>;

He shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> on high <WH4791>: his place of defence <WH4869> shall be the munitions <WH4679> of rocks <WH5553>: bread <WH3899> shall be given <WH5414> <WH8737> him; his waters <WH4325> shall be sure <WH539> <WH8737>.
Thine eyes <WH5869> shall see <WH2372> <WH8799> the king <WH4428> in his beauty <WH3308>: they shall behold <WH7200> <WH8799> the land <WH776> that is very far off <WH4801>.

Thine heart <WH3820> shall meditate <WH1897> <WH8799> terror <WH367>. Where is the scribe <WH5608> <WH8802>? where is the receiver <WH8254> <WH8802>? where is he that counted <WH5608> <WH8802> the towers <WH4026> ?

Thou shalt not see <WH7200> <WH8799> a fierce <WH3267> <WH8737> people <WH5971>, a people <WH5971> of a deeper <WH6012> speech <WH8193> than thou canst perceive <WH8085> <WH8800>; of a stammering <WH3932> <WH8737> tongue <WH3956>, that thou canst not understand <WH998>.

Look <WH2372> <WH8798> upon TZiyon <WH6726>, the city <WH7151> of our solemnities <WH4150>: thine eyes <WH5869> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> Yerushalayim <WH3389> a quiet <WH7600> habitation <WH5116>, a tabernacle <WH168> that shall not be taken down <WH6813> <WH8799>; not one of the stakes <WH3489> thereof shall ever <WH5331> be removed <WH5265> <WH8799>, neither shall any of the cords <WH2256> thereof be broken <WH5423> <WH8735>.

But there the glorious <WH117> YY <WH3068> will be unto us a place <WH4725> of broad <WH7342> <WH3027> rivers <WH5104> and streams <WH2975>; wherein shall go <WH3212> <WH8799> no <WH1077> galley <WH590> with oars <WH7885>, neither shall gallant <WH117> ship <WH6716> pass <WH5674> <WH8799> thereby.
For the YY <WH3068> is our judge <WH8199> <WH8802>, the YY <WH3068> is our Torahgiver <WH2710> <WH8781>, the YY <WH3068> is our king <WH4428>; he will save <WH3467> <WH8686> us.

Thy tacklings <WH2256> are loosed <WH5203> <WH8738>; they could not well <WH3653> strengthen <WH2388> <WH8762> their mast <WH8650>, they could not spread <WH6566> <WH8804> the sail <WH5251>: then is the prey <WH5706> of a great <WH4766> spoil <WH7998> divided <WH2505> <WH8795>; the lame <WH6455> take <WH962> <WH8804> the prey <WH957>.

And the inhabitant <WH7934> shall not say <WH559> <WH8799>, I am sick <WH2470> <WH8804>: the people <WH5971> that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> therein shall be forgiven <WH5375> <WH8803> their iniquity <WH5771>.
